feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(sidebar): improve animation by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1107
  • fix: isWSL check was not awaited by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1110
  • fix(style): clean up sidebar related style issue by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1106
  • fix: fixed missing cluster side item by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1109
  • fix: db type typo by @TheLetslook in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1115
  • refactor: update icon handling and restructure sidebar external links by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1119
  • feat(template): added cloudflared by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1104
  • feat(template): added conduwuit by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1112
  • style: fix tablet and mobile (Create from Template) by @thebadking in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1121
  • feat(style): custom scrollbar styling by @TheLetslook in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1128
  • feat(template): added it-tools by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1123
  • Update telegram message notification by @shiqocred in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1088
  • feat: add ci skip check by @izayl in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1118
  • feat(notifications): implement gotify provider by @depado in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1081
  • fix: Update link text and destination for db backup settings by @agustints in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1131
  • chore: typo "accesed" changed to "accessed" for TS code by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1069
  • feat: added couchdb template by @SlavenIvanov in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1125
  • feat: add cleanup cache on deployments by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1134
  • Feat/GitHub runners by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1137

New Contributors

  • @TheLetslook made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1115
  • @thebadking made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1121
  • @izayl made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1118
  • @depado made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1081
  • @agustints made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1131
  • @SlavenIvanov made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1125

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.2...v0.17.3

  • Add missing settings option in usernav

  • ðŸš€ Release v0.17.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1144

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • style(i18n) add ukrainian language by @mikield in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1162
  • fix(ui): volume mountPath undefined for file mount - meant to display filePath instead? by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1160
  • fix(ui): volume file mount content, line clamp and preserve whitespace by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1161
  • feat(template): added apache superset (unofficial) by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1158
  • refactor: make protected instead of admin by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1167
  • fix: filter navigation items based on user's permissions and role by @rahadi23 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1166

New Contributors

  • @mikield made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1162
  • @rahadi23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.5...v0.17.6
